fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 83.50 points or 0.43% to settle at 19,439.40. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, declined 3.92% to 11.01. Reliance Industries, HDFC Bank and Axis Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The July 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 27 July 2023.
